word_json: {"wordRank":5,"headWord":"analyse","content":{"word":{"wordHead":"analyse","wordId":"CET4_3_5","content":{"sentence":{"sentences":[{"sContent":"She still needs to analyse the data.","sCn":"她仍需要分析这些数据。"},{"sContent":"You need to sit down and analyse why you feel so upset.","sCn":"你得坐下来想一想自己为什么会那么生气。"},{"sContent":"Joe had never tried to analyze their relationship.","sCn":"乔从未试图去理清他们的关系。"}],"desc":"例句"},"usphone":"'æn(ə)laɪz","syno":{"synos":[{"pos":"vt","tran":"分析；分解；细察","hwds":[{"w":"study"},{"w":"break down"}]}],"desc":"同近"},"ukphone":"'ænəlaɪz","ukspeech":"analyse&type=1","remMethod":{"val":" ana(分开) ＋ lyse(放) → 分开放 → 分解； 分析","desc":"记忆"},"relWord":{"rels":[{"pos":"adj","words":[{"hwd":"analytical","tran":" 分析的；解析的；善于分析的"},{"hwd":"analytic","tran":" 分析的；解析的；善于分析的"},{"hwd":"analyzable","tran":" 可分析的"}]},{"pos":"adv","words":[{"hwd":"analytically","tran":" 分析地；解析地"}]},{"pos":"n","words":[{"hwd":"analysis","tran":" 分析；分解；验定"},{"hwd":"analyzer","tran":" [计] 分析器；分析者；检偏镜"},{"hwd":"analyser","tran":" 分析器，分析仪；分析者"},{"hwd":"analyticity","tran":" 分析性，[数] 解析性"}]}],"desc":"同根"},"usspeech":"analyse&type=2","trans":[{"tranCn":" 分析； 分解； 解析","descOther":"英释","pos":"vt","descCn":"中释","tranOther":"to examine or think about something carefully, in order to understand it"}]}}},"bookId":"CET4_3"}
